name: Anemo Hypostasis
desc:
Code name: Beth. A high-purity Anemo entity.
Elemental hypostases are life forms which have completely abandoned their former appearance and biological structure, making them able to reach the highest level of elemental purity.
Research into hypostases is mainly led by scholars of Sumeru Akademiya, but due to the level of danger that they pose, little of substance is known about hypostases beyond their scientific name and code name.

customize.text: Elemental creatures who protect themselves from incoming attack with their durable shell. Find an opportune moment to land a blow to their <color=#ffe14b>elemental core</color> . They are able to control their <color=#ffe14b>elemental orb</color> in fights and restore their health when they feel threatened. If you fail to utilize the upcurrents to absorb these orbs, the battle will be significantly harder.

<color=#ffd780>"That's one big Crystalfly"</color>
Absorb all of an Anemo Hypostasis' Wind Crystals before it can be revived.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>"...Not indicative of final product"</color>
Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis that has undergone 4 types of Elemental Conversions.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Back With the Wind</color>
Absorb at least 10 Elemental Orbs created by the Anemo Hypostasis in a single battle.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>That's One Big Crystalfly</color>
Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Hurricane Seed
dropMaterial.desc:
The imploded form of an Anemo Hypostasis upon its defeat.
Contains the essence of Anemo energy.
It is said that the power to create hurricanes resides within its seemingly fragile body. This butterfly of pure Anemo energy must surely be waiting for the day when it can conjure up storms once again.

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."
